content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: BulkDeleteRules path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/rules/bulk_delete content: params

desc a stack id or slug

schema

name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema

sum delete multiple rules
reqbody

type obj
ruleids
type str
desc the ids of the rules to delete
